Objective: Verify navigating to Contact us page from footer link
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps: 1) Click Contact us under Customer Services Label in footer
Expected Result: The User should be navigated to Contact Us page
Actual Result: The User is navigated to Contact Us page

Objective: Verify navigating to Contact us page from header icon button
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps: 1) Click the Phone icon button in header
Expected Result: The User should be navigated to Contact Us page
Actual Result: The User is navigated to Contact Us page

Objective: Verify navigating to Contact us page from store owner button in order success page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Place an order
2) Click store owner link
Expected Result: The User should be navigated to Contact Us page
Actual Result: The User is navigated to Contact Us page

Objective: Verify Contact us by providing all the fields
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click the Phone icon button in header
2) Fill all the necessary values
3) Click Submit
Expected Result: The User should shown text "Your enquiry has been successfully sent to the store owner!" and navigated to success page
Actual Result: The User is shown text "Your enquiry has been successfully sent to the store owner!" and navigated to success page

Objective: Verify Contact us by providing no fields
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click the Phone icon button in header
2) Do not fill any values
3) Click Submit
Expected Result: Proper field level warnings should be shown
Actual Result: Proper field level warnings are shown

Objective: Verify Contact us by providing empty spaces

Test Steps:

2) Fill all values with only spaces
3) Click Submit

Actual Result: Proper field level warnings are shown

Objective: Verify Contact us trims the leading and trailing spaces
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click the Phone icon button in header
2) Fill all values with leading and trailing spaces
3) Click Submit
Expected Result: The enquiry should be sent with the spaces trimmed
Actual Result: The enquiry is sent with the spaces trimmed
